issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce
# configure exclude node as nm1 hostname
# start resourcemanager
# start nm1 hostname
# with current configuration during node registration the node gets rejected.
# Now check RM UI
fields.summary: Rack shown as null for node decommisioned during registration.

comments.body:
Thanks [~bibinchundatt]

Patch look straight forward to me. Pending jenkins.
